explanation_popup.title: Popularity Value Explanation
explanation_popup.content: Popularity value is an important indicator of how well your work is received. By increasing your popularity value, you can gain more benefits and creative opportunities in the future.
explanation_popup.content1: The following actions by users on your work will increase the popularity value:
explanation_popup.content3: will all increase the popularity value.
explanation_popup.content4: By attracting new users to use your work through sharing, you can
explanation_popup.content6: Note: Each device user‚Äôs same action on the same work is only counted once.
explanation_popup.title2: What is Popularity Value Used For?
explanation_popup.content8: You can withdraw the popularity value you have gained, turning your creative passion into actual earnings.
explanation_popup.content9: Works with high popularity value will receive more recommendations and exposure opportunities, allowing more people to see your wonderful creations.
explanation_popup.content10: High popularity value is a reflection of a creator's influence and an important mark of community recognition.
